Game.Name: Fantastic Dizzy (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Dizzy's cartoon adventure in Zakeria - a magical kingdom ruled by the evil wizard Zaks. Explore the mysterious diamond mines, fabulous caverns, dragon's lair, cloud castle, encounter strange magicians, wizards, trolls, pirates, leprechauns and many other weird and wonderful creatures.Cheat: Free LifeTo get one free life, pause the game and press 2, Left, Left, Left, Left, 2. This only works once.
Game.Notes: Dizzy's cartoon adventure in Zakeria - a magical kingdom ruled by the evil wizard Zaks. Explore the mysterious diamond mines, fabulous caverns, dragon's lair, cloud castle, encounter strange magicians, wizards, trolls, pirates, leprechauns and many other weird and wonderful creatures.
